Package skywaysolutions.app.database

Class DatabaseTableBase<T extends DatabaseEntityBase>

java.lang.Object
skywaysolutions.app.database.DatabaseTableBase<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The DatabaseEntityBase class that is being stored in the table.
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlankTableAccessor, BlankTypeTableAccessor, CustomerTableAccessor, DiscountTableAccessor, ExchangeRateTableAccessor, FlexibleDiscountEntriesTableAccessor, RefundTableAccessor, SaleTableAccessor, StaffTableAccessor, TransactionTableAccessor
public abstract class DatabaseTableBase<T extends DatabaseEntityBase> extends Object
This class provides a base class that is used by all database table managers.
Author:
Alfred Manville

    • DatabaseTableBase

      Constructs a new DatabaseTableBase with the specified connection.
      Parameters:
      conn - The connection to use.

  • Method Details

    • getTableName

      protected abstract String getTableName()
      This should return the name of the table.
      Returns:
      The name of the table.

    • getAuxTableName

      protected final String getAuxTableName()
      This returns the auxiliary table name.
      Returns:
      The name of the auxiliary table.

    • getIDColumnName

      protected abstract String getIDColumnName()
      This should return the name of the ID column.
      Returns:
      The name of the ID column.

    • loadOneFrom

      protected abstract T loadOneFrom(ResultSet rs, boolean locked) throws CheckedException
      This loads one instance of DatabaseTableBase from the current result set. DO NOT call ResultSet.next().

      This means that the class extending DatabaseEntityBase should have a constructor that takes a IDB_Connector and ResultSet to allow for a direct load to occur.

      Parameters:
      rs - The result set to use for loading.
      locked - If the object is currently locked.
      Returns:
      An instance of DatabaseTableBase.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • noLoadOneFrom

      protected abstract T noLoadOneFrom(ResultSet rs) throws CheckedException
      This creates one instance of DatabaseTableBase using the ID from the current result set without loading. DO NOT call ResultSet.next().

      This means that the class extending DatabaseEntityBase should have a constructor that takes a IDB_Connector and ResultSet to allow for a direct load to occur.

      Parameters:
      rs - The result set to use for loading.
      Returns:
      An instance of DatabaseTableBase.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • getTableSchema

      protected abstract String getTableSchema()
      Gets the table schema (The bit that's located between the brackets). For: "CREATE TABLE test (id int, test varchar(255))" Becomes: "id int, test varchar(255)"
      Returns:
      The table schema portion between the brackets.

    • getAuxTableSchema

      protected abstract String getAuxTableSchema()
      Gets the table auxiliary schema (The bit that's located between the brackets). This is only has the ID column corresponding to the main table. For Main Table: "CREATE TABLE test (id int, test varchar(255))" For Aux Table: "CREATE TABLE test (id int)" Becomes: "id int"
      Returns:
      The aux table schema portion between the brackets.

    • assureTableSchema

      public final void assureTableSchema() throws CheckedException
      Makes sure the main and aux tables have been created.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurs.

    • purgeTableSchema

      public final void purgeTableSchema() throws CheckedException
      Drops the main and aux tables. Clears the cache.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurs.

    • cacheOne

      public final void cacheOne(T entity)
      Updates the cache using the specified object.
      Parameters:
      entity - The object to cache.

    • getObjectID

      protected abstract Object getObjectID(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException
      Gets the ID of the object in the result set position.
      Parameters:
      rs - The result set.
      Returns:
      The ID.
      Throws:
      SQLException - An SQL error has occurred.

    • loadOne

      protected abstract T loadOne(Object ID) throws CheckedException
      Loads one object via its ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the object to load.
      Returns:
      The object.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A load error has occurred.

    • load

      public final T load(Object ID, boolean reLoad) throws CheckedException
      Loads an object via its ID and if it should be reloaded if it exists in the cache.
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the object to load.
      reLoad - If the object should be reloaded if it exists in the cache.
      Returns:
      The object.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A load error has occurred.

    • loadMany

      public final List<T> loadMany(IFilterStatementCreator filter, MultiLoadSyncMode syncMode) throws CheckedException
      Loads many DatabaseTableBases from the main table, allowing for a filter provided by IFilterStatementCreator. Also has a MultiLoadSyncMode to define the object locking behaviour during this retrieval.
      Parameters:
      filter - The filter statement builder that extends the statement passed to it and returns a fully parametrized PreparedStatement.
      syncMode - The locking behaviour during retrieval.
      Returns:
      A list of loaded DatabaseTableBase.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurs.

    • refreshAll

      public final void refreshAll() throws CheckedException
      Reloads all the cached entities, locks and unlocks the table.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurs.

    • lockAll

      public final void lockAll() throws CheckedException
      Locks all the rows. DO NOT forget to unlockAll(boolean) once finished.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurs.

    • createAllAuxRows

      protected abstract void createAllAuxRows() throws CheckedException
      This should insert all the aux rows. Select all the IDs from the main table to get what to insert. Use IDB_Connector.getStatement(String) to get a PreparedStatement. ^ Don't forget to use the try([resource]) {} Use getTableName() to get the table name for selection. Use getAuxTableName() to get the table name for insertion. DO NOT use any public functions provided by DatabaseTableBase in here otherwise a deadlock could occur.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • createAllAuxRowsIntID

      protected final void createAllAuxRowsIntID() throws CheckedException
      Inserts all the aux rows using ints as a primary key.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • createAllAuxRowsLongID

      protected final void createAllAuxRowsLongID() throws CheckedException
      Inserts all the aux rows using longs as a primary key.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • createAllAuxRowsStringID

      protected final void createAllAuxRowsStringID() throws CheckedException
      Inserts all the aux rows using strings as a primary key.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error has occurred.

    • unlockAll

      public final void unlockAll(boolean force) throws CheckedException
      Unlocks all the rows allowing them to be used by other connections. See: lockAll()
      Parameters:
      force - Force the unlock.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurs.

    • deleteAll

      public final void deleteAll() throws CheckedException
      Deletes all the rows and clears the cache. isAllLocked() should be true.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - An error occurs.

    • isAllLocked

      public final boolean isAllLocked()
      Returns if all the rows have been locked.
      Returns:
      If all the rows are locked.

    • internalLoad

      protected final T internalLoad(T toLoad) throws CheckedException
      Loads the passed entity. Useful for loadOne(Object).
      Parameters:
      toLoad - The entity to load.
      Returns:
      The loaded entity.
      Throws:
      CheckedException - A load failure has occurred.
